name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by madnes, FVVS, pwb, gothfae, Connellingus, Koremora, NDCaesar, Sargasm, atticusonline, Kennisiou, the_dingle, Daniel, luckypyjamas, lk, mistlethrush, mashuren, nutmeg, Circadin, alejandroadam, Wite_Rabit, slalvation, morbo)

name: theunity
text: I now use the phrase "pulling deeply from a bottle..." thanks to this strip. Well done.

name: relaxing
text: When pulling from the bottle, always remember to bend at the knees.  It is important to exercise proper pulling technique.

name: kennisiou
text: If you pull too deeply and don't bend at the knees you'll really hurt your muscles, man.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Help a brother out here. Space and time be crazy today.

name: epicurus
text: I love these ones so much. His descriptions of Ray are the best.

name: epicurus
text: Notice that Mr. Twain apparently thinks it unusual that a cat should not be able to speak and attributes it to nervous agitation.

name: stuart
text: If I saw a cat wearing glasses and a thong get out of a time machine on its hind legs, I'd expect it to start talking too.

name: achilleselbow
text: Well of course NOW you would.

name: closefriend
text: This strip feels like Alan Moore wrote it.

name: honesttom
text: Midnight. Time machine lands on lawn. Cat gets out, drinks from bottle of wine. This cat is afraid of me. I have seen its true face."

name: nighttoad
text: there are certain things i never could have imagined imagining. mark twain as rorschach is one of them. thank you for expanding my consciousness, i guess.

name: pa_ass_nts
text: A chubby for you

name: evolume
text: I believe that Mark Twain would indeed help a brother out in this regard.

name: spinynorman
text: I like how Ray is so into taking a pull from that wine bottle that he has to bed his knees. It's like he's doing a dance.

name: fizhburn
text: What is the deal with Ray all squatting down to drink wine? It looks like he's making room.

name: thequietyou
text: Most of us have had at least one time when the most help we could hope for would be someone telling us where we were in terms of space and time...being from Hartford mine was actually at the Mark Twain House.

name: charchar
text: neat story!

name: radchillies
text:
"liquor improved his spirits "

this comment is a solid 5 for the elegant pun

name: howl
text: Philippe is a sea otter, as we have seen in the photographs of the trip to England.
